description:
Akihiko`s latest novel was a huge success. Now he`s surrounded by gifts from well-wishers, and being whisked away to a dinner party with famous publishers. Misaki wants to congratulate Akihiko too, but he`ll have to find a gift that comes from the heart!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Sode Suri Au mo Tashou no "En"
There`s No Such Thing as a Chance Encounter
袖すり合うも他生の縁
